root.cn: 这是平板上一款宝宝们喜爱的儿童认识常见交通工具的软件，宝宝只需将左边的贴纸图片拖到右边对应的位置即可，让宝宝在轻松的游戏过程中，快速认识各种不同的交通工具. 有汽车,飞机,轮船,自行车,摩托车,火箭,火车,太阳,月亮等等，同时锻炼了宝宝的观察力、想象力和逻辑思维能力。 宝宝们，赶快来体验贴纸游戏的乐趣吧！ 我们产品的特色： 1、操作简单：动动小手指拖动图片，宝宝更易上手。 2，学习认知：一边玩一边认识各种交通工具，寓教于乐。 3，提供几十种好玩的超高清交通工具与七种色彩鲜艳生动的场景！ 4，帮助您的孩子增进以下几个方面的能力:问题解决的能力 逻辑与认知能力 专心和注意力 记忆力 语言技能(学习简单英文词汇和发音)
root.en: This is a kind of software that children like to know the common means of transportation on the Pad. Just drag the sticker picture on the left to the corresponding position on the right, so that children can quickly know various means of transportation in the process of relaxed games. There are cars, airplanes, ships, bicycles, motorcycles, rockets, trains, the sun, the moon, etc., and exercise their observation and imagination And logical thinking ability. Babies, come to experience the fun of the sticker game! Features of our products: 1. Simple operation: move the little finger to drag the picture, the baby is easier to use. 2. Learning and cognition: while playing, we know all kinds of transportation tools, teaching and entertainment. 3. Provide dozens of fun Ultra HD vehicles and seven colorful and vivid scenes! 4. Help your child improve the following abilities: problem-solving ability, logical and cognitive ability, concentration and attention memory language skills (learning simple English vocabulary and pronunciation)
